title: America’s Best Food Cities: New York City
text:
America’s Best Food Cities: New York City
Russ & Daughters has sold high-end specialty foods in Manhattan for just over 100 years. During the dinner rush at the Italian-flavored Carbone, pasta cook Larry Lao prepares tortellini. Acclaimed chef Eric Ripert has helmed Le Bernardin for the past 24 years. With Italian on the walls and Sinatra in the air, Carbone is an old-fashioned homage to red sauce in Manhattan. A fishmonger tends the counter in Flushing, Queens. A customer multitasks over pulled noodle soup in the Golden Shopping Mall in Queens. The Golden Shopping Mall in Flushing, Queens, includes an underground maze of food stalls. At Jean-Georges, a salad is seasoned before serving.
